data.text: Egha dughiar igharazir mam Iesus God ko mɨgeir dɨpenimɨn ghua garima, dafarim ekonezir gumazir mam, gumazamizir avɨribar tongɨn dɨpenir kamɨn aven iti. A itima gumazir maba uaghan iti. Me, Iesus bizitam damightɨ, me akam agasasa bar deravɨram an gari. Me kamaghsua an gari. A Sabatɨn gumazir kamɨn akuragham, o?
Me bizir kam bagha an garavɨra itima, Iesus kamaghɨn dafarim ekonezir gumazim mɨgei, “Nɨ dɨkavigh izɨ bar en guamɨn tugh.”

Gumazim dɨkavigha tuzɨma, Iesus kamaghɨn men azara, “Arazir manam Sabatɨn arazim abɨki? E arazir aghuim damuam, o arazir kuram damuam, o gumazimɨn akuragham, o gumazim gasɨghasɨgham?” A kamaghɨn men azarazɨma, me bar nɨmɨra iti.

An damazimning bar gumazamizibagh aruava, navimɨn aven men atari. A men garima, men naviba gavgavigha apangkuvir nɨghnɨziba men puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn a bar osemegha gumazim kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ uan dafarim onegh.” Ezɨ gumazir kam uan dafarim onezɨma, an dafarim ua dera.
3:6 Matyu 22:15-16Ezɨ Farisiba kamaghɨn ganigha dɨpenim ategha azenan ghuegha Herotɨn gumaziba ko ikia Iesus mɨsoghasa akabar kɨri.
Ezɨ Iesus uan suren gumaziba ko Galilin Dɨpar Akaremɨn ghuaghiri. A ghuaghirima gumazamizir avɨriba Galilin Distrighɨn ikegha an gɨn ghuaghiri.

3:8 Matyu 4:25Gumazamizir avɨriba Judian Distrik ko, Jerusalemɨn nguibam ko, Idumean Distrik ko, Jordanɨn Fanemɨn vongɨn itir danganiba ko, Tair ko Saidonɨn nguibamningɨn ikegha Iesus bagha ghuaghiri. Gumazamizir avɨrir kaba, me an amizir bizibar akam baregha a bagha ghuaghiri.

3:9-10 Matyu 9:21; 14:36; Mak 4:1; Mak 5:29; 6:56; Luk 5:1-3; Luk 7:21Me iraghuezɨma, Iesus gumazamizir avɨribar akurazɨma, men arɨmariaba gɨfa. Arɨmariaba itir gumazamizir avɨriba uan arɨmariaba agɨvasa Iesusɨn boroghɨn uari akuvagha, Iesusɨn suighasa uari munamadi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Iesus uan suren gumazibav gɨa ghaze, “Ia botɨn tam inigh izɨ puram anetɨghtɨ a ikɨ. Eghtɨ gumazamiziba bar na akuvaghtɨma kɨ botɨn ghuavanangam.”
3:11 Mak 1:23-24; Luk 4:41Iesus me mɨgeima, duar kuraba apazazir gumazir maba iza, Iesusɨn gara duar kuraba zuamɨra me gamima me Iesusɨn guamɨn daighira kamaghɨn dɨa mɨgei, “Nɨ Godɨn Otarim.”
Me kamaghɨn mɨgeima, a men anogorogha ghaze, me an gun gumazir igharazibav kɨman markɨ.
Egha Iesus dɨpar mɨriamɨn ikegha dɨkavigha mɨghsɨamɨn ghuavanabogha uan ifongezir gumazibar diazɨma, me a bagha zui.
Me zuima a gumazir 12pla mɨsevegha ziar kam, aposelba, me gatɨ. Eghtɨ me a ko ikɨtɨ, a gɨn me amangɨtɨ me mangɨ Godɨn Akar Aghuim akunam.
Egh a uan gavgavim me danɨngtɨma me uaghan duar kuraba batogham.
3:16 Jon 1:42A mɨsevezir gumazir 12plan ziabar kara. Saimon (Iesus gɨn ziar kam, Pita, a gatɨ),
3:17 Luk 9:54Sebedin otarimning Jems ko Jon (A ziar kam aning gatɨ, Boanerges. Ziar kamɨn mɨngarim kamaghɨn ghu, atara pamtem mɨgeir gumazimning),
Andru ko Filip, Bartolomyu, Matyu, Tomas, Alfiusɨn otarim Jems, Tadius, Saimon (a Selotbar gumazir mam),
ko Judas Iskariot, gumazir Iesus isava, apanibagh anɨngizim.
Egha Iesus uamategha dɨpenimɨn aven ghugha itima gumazamizir avɨriba izava anekufa. Me bar anekufa, kamaghɨn amizɨ, a uan suren gumaziba ko daghebar aman ibura. Me damamin dughiaba puvatɨ.
3:21 Jon 7:5; 10:20Ezɨ gumazamizir maba kamaghɨn mɨgei, “An ongani.” Ezɨ Iesusɨn adarazi akar kam baregha, a inigh mangasa izi.

Ezɨ Judan Arazibagh fozir gumazir maba Jerusalemɨn ikegha izaghira kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Belsebul a gapasa. A duar kurabar gumazir dapanimɨn gavgavimɨn duar kuraba batosi.”3:22 Satanɨn ziar mamra kara, Belsebul.
Ezɨ Iesus me mɨgeir akam baregha, egha kamaghɨn gumazamizibar diagha akar isɨn zuir mabar me mɨgei, “Satan manmaghɨn uabɨra uabɨ batuegham?
Kantrin tamɨn gumazamiziba uari tuiragh uarira uariv soghtɨ, kantrin kam ikian kogham.
Eghtɨ dɨpenir vamɨran itir darazi uari abigh uarira uariv sogh dɨpenir kamɨn itir darazi ikian kogham.
Kamaghɨra Satan uan adarazi ko uari abigh uariv sogh, egh me manmaghɨn tugh gavgavigh bizibar ganamin gavgavim ikiam? Bar puvatɨgham.

“Eghtɨ gumazir manatam puram aven mangɨ gumazir gavgavitamɨn dɨpenim akarighɨva an biziba okemegham? Puvatɨgham. A faraghɨvɨra benibar gumazir gavgavir kam ikegham. A kamaghɨn a damigh, egh gumazir kamɨn dɨpenimɨn aven mangɨ, an biziba okemegham.
“Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, gumazamizibar arazir kuraba ko me Godɨn ziam gasɨghasɨzir akaba, God da gɨn amangamin tuavim iti.
Eghtɨ gumazitam Godɨn Duamɨn ziam gasɨghasightɨma God an arazir kurar kam, a gɨn amadaghan kogham. Egh gumazir kam aremeghtɨ, arazir kurar kam an ikɨvɨra ikiam.”

Me faragha kamaghɨn a mɨgɨa ghaze, “Duar kurar mam a gapasa.” A bizir kam bagha, akar kabar me mɨgei.3:30 Iesus Godɨn Duamɨn gavgavimɨn ingari. Ezɨ me ghaze, a Satanɨn gavgavimɨn ingari. Me kamaghɨn Godɨn Duamɨn ziam gasɨghasɨsi.
Ezɨ Iesusɨn amebam ko doziba izava, a itir dɨpenimɨn tiar akamɨn tughava gumazir mam amadazɨma a Iesus mɨkɨmasa aven zui.
Ezɨ gumazamizir avɨriba a koma apiaghav ikia kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ oragh, nɨn amebam ko doziba nɨ bagha izeghava azenan iti.”
Me a mɨkemezɨma a kamaghɨn men azara, “Tina nan amebam? Te nan doziba?”
A kamaghɨn men azaragha, egha an okarigha apiaghav itir gumazamizibar gara, kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia gan! Nan amebam ko dozibara kara.
Gumazamizir God ifongezir arazibar gɨn zuiba, me nan doziba ko nan amiziba ko nan amebam.”
